original_title: Unrepentant: Kevin Annett and Canada's Genocide
overview: The award winning "Unrepentant: Kevin Annett and Canada's Genocide" documents Canada's dirty secret - the planned genocide of aboriginal people in church-run Indian Residential Schools - and a clergyman's efforts to document and make public these crimes. First-hand testimonies from residential school survivors are interwoven with Kevin Annett's own story of how he faced firing, de-frocking, and the loss of his family, reputation and livelihood as a result of his efforts to help survivors and bring out the truth of the residential schools.
title: Unrepentant: Kevin Annett and Canada's Genocide
